mapper.select: SELECT no, title, answer, writer, reg_date, update_date FROM (select /*+INDEX_DESC(faq pk_faq) */ rownum as rn, no, title, answer, writer, reg_date, update_date FROM FAQ WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ (title, answer, writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{answer}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE FAQ SET title = #{title}, answer = #{answer}, writer = #{writer}, update_date = current_date WHERE no = #{no}
